title: Status Type
description: Defines the types of mission status (e.g., Inactive, Operational) with a ranking system for priority or classification.

id.description: Unique identifier for the status type.

name.description: The descriptive name of the status type (e.g., 'Operational', 'Inactive').

rank.description: The ranking or priority level of the status type, where lower numbers may represent higher priority.
